Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Maternal disomy and Prader - Willi syndrome consistent with gamete complementation in a case of familial translocation ( 3 ; 15 ) ( p25 ; q11 . 2 ) .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities in the paragraph you provided:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Maternal disomy |
| Prader - Willi syndrome |

Note that "gamete complementation" is not a disease, but rather a genetic phenomenon that can occur in cases of familial translocation. Therefore, it is not included in the list of diseases.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Prader - Willi syndrome |

The entity "Maternal disomy" does not clearly refer to a disease, so it has been removed from the list.
